name: Operation Reboot 1.4 Beta
description:
----------------------------------

>>> The newest update for Operation Reboot▮

----------------------------------

----------------------------------

----------------------------------

Version 1.4 ► Completely reworked graphics and performance with  better interaction, tasks, items, effects, weapons,  secrets and much more...

Executable download is awailable for Windows.

Support for MacOS and Linux distributions coming soon!

----------------------------------

How to play:

----------------------------------

► The goal of every level is to cross the dungeons or facilities as fast as possible, using whatever you find along the way like grappling guns, keys or secret powerups. The stopwatch in the upper right corner shows past time since entering a level.

► Left mouse click activates the RPG Launcher.

Homing missiles, blue slicers, AI drones in Level1 and Boss-Power-Cores can be destroyed using it, red path following drones are immune

► After finding  the grappling gun it can be used by right clicking in the desired direction. Note: you only have a limited capacity of grappling shots

► Press space to jump, when touching a wall you can walljump by pressing space several times

► An energy based shield is available since Level2 however its maximum active time is limited by 5 seconds in total and the recharging after every usage takes 10 seconds. It can be activated by holding down the S key

► Collected keys or items will be stored automatically after reaching a checkpoint

► The Heads Up Display (HUD) provides information like ammunition status, shield status, inventory occupancy and time

The game is still under development and more levels will come with future updates. Currently I have only limited working time because of school :(

Feel free to post ideas, critics or comments in the section below
